description: Try our easy to follow Black Widow Lunch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Widow Lunch Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot, cut into thin sticks
30g lean chicken breast, cooked and shredded

recipeInstructions.text: To make the quesadilla, place grated cheese, spinach and chicken on half of the wrap, then fold in half to enclose filling. Toast in sandwich press until golden. Cool. Cut into triangles. Serve with sliced kiwifruit or whole pear.

To make the dip, preheat oven to 200oC/180oC fan-forced. Wrap each beetroot in foil and place on a baking tray. Bake for 45 minutes or until tender when pierced with a skewer. Cool completely. Wear rubber gloves to peel and chop beetroot. Place in a food processor with yoghurt and parsley, then process until smooth. Serve with carrot sticks arranged as spider legs around dip. (Beetroot dip serves 6. Store any leftover dip in an airtight container in the fridge.)

HowToTip.tipText: Pack items next to a frozen drink or ice brick in lunch box to keep cool.

recipeInstructions.text: Pack corn thins, sliced cheese and tomato separately and assemble at school to prevent corn thins from becoming soggy.
